clauses.title: Introduction
clauses.text: {{businessName}} ('we', 'us') operates {{websiteUrl}}. By accessing this site, you agree to these legally binding Terms.

clauses.title: Account Security
clauses.text: You’re responsible for all activities under your account. Notify {{businessName}} immediately of unauthorized use.

clauses.title: Pricing & Taxes
clauses.text: All prices on {{websiteUrl}} are in USD/GBP. Sales tax/VAT will be calculated at checkout based on your location.

clauses.title: Order Cancellation
clauses.text: {{businessName}} reserves the right to cancel orders suspected of fraud, pricing errors, or inventory issues.

clauses.title: Shipping (UK)
clauses.text: UK orders ship within 3 days via Royal Mail. {{businessName}} isn’t liable for customs delays or fees.

clauses.title: Shipping (US)
clauses.text: US orders ship via USPS/FedEx. Express shipping costs are non-refundable if you initiate a return.

clauses.title: Returns (UK)
clauses.text: Under UK law, you may return goods within 14 days for a full refund. Contact {{businessName}} at [email] for authorization.

clauses.title: Returns (US)
clauses.text: US returns require a pre-approved RMA from {{businessName}}. Refunds exclude original shipping costs.

clauses.title: Intellectual Property
clauses.text: All {{websiteUrl}} content, including product photos, is owned by {{businessName}}. Scraping = lawsuit.

clauses.title: Governing Law
clauses.text: Disputes with {{businessName}} will be resolved in [UK/US] courts based on your shipping address.

clauses.title: Introduction
clauses.text: Welcome to {{websiteUrl}}! These terms govern your use of our website and services. By using this site, you accept these terms.

clauses.title: Account Creation
clauses.text: By creating an account, you agree to provide accurate and up-to-date information. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials.

clauses.title: Payment
clauses.text: All transactions are processed in USD/GBP. Payment is due at the time of order and must be made via authorized payment methods.

clauses.title: Shipping & Delivery
clauses.text: Shipping timeframes may vary depending on location. You agree to provide accurate shipping information to avoid delays.

clauses.title: Return & Refund Policy
clauses.text: Returns are accepted within 30 days of purchase, provided the product is unused and in its original packaging.

clauses.title: Taxes & Duties
clauses.text: All applicable sales tax/VAT will be added at checkout. Customers are responsible for customs duties or other taxes imposed by their country.

clauses.title: Privacy & Security
clauses.text: Your privacy is important to us. We utilize encryption technology to protect your payment and personal information during transactions.

clauses.title: Limitation of Liability
clauses.text: We are not liable for any damages, losses, or injuries resulting from the use of our products or services.

clauses.title: Intellectual Property
clauses.text: All content on this website, including text, images, and logos, is the property of {{businessName}} and protected by copyright laws.

clauses.title: Governing Law
clauses.text: These terms will be governed by the laws of the United States or United Kingdom, depending on your location.

clauses.title: Acceptance of Terms
clauses.text: By using {{websiteUrl}}, you agree to comply with these Terms and Conditions, including any future changes or updates.

clauses.title: Account Responsibility
clauses.text: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and all activities under your account.

clauses.title: Order Processing & Cancellation
clauses.text: Orders will be processed upon receipt of payment. {{businessName}} reserves the right to cancel any order for fraud prevention or inventory issues.

clauses.title: Shipping & Delivery
clauses.text: We ship worldwide. Delivery times vary by destination, and shipping fees are calculated at checkout.

clauses.title: Returns & Exchanges
clauses.text: We accept returns within 14 days for products that are defective or damaged. To request a return, contact us at [email].

clauses.title: Taxes & Charges
clauses.text: All prices listed are exclusive of taxes. You are responsible for paying any sales tax or other taxes that apply to your location.

clauses.title: Prohibited Activities
clauses.text: You agree not to use our website for any illegal or unauthorized activities, including fraud, spamming, and harassment.

clauses.title: Privacy Policy
clauses.text: We value your privacy. All personal information provided to us will be handled in accordance with our Privacy Policy.

clauses.title: Intellectual Property
clauses.text: All content on {{websiteUrl}}, including images, graphics, and trademarks, is the property of {{businessName}}.

clauses.title: Dispute Resolution
clauses.text: Any disputes will be resolved through arbitration, and jurisdiction will be limited to [UK/US].

clauses.title: General Terms
clauses.text: By accessing {{websiteUrl}}, you agree to these Terms and Conditions, which may be updated from time to time.

clauses.title: Account Management
clauses.text: You must keep your account information accurate. Notify us immediately of any unauthorized access or use of your account.

clauses.title: Payment Terms
clauses.text: We accept payments through Visa, Mastercard, and PayPal. All payments are processed in USD/GBP.

clauses.title: Shipping Policy
clauses.text: Shipping charges will be calculated at checkout. All orders will be processed within 2-3 business days.

clauses.title: Returns & Refunds
clauses.text: Returns are accepted within 14 days of purchase for a full refund. Items must be unused and in their original condition.

clauses.title: Taxes
clauses.text: Applicable taxes, including sales tax or VAT, will be added to the final order total based on your location.

clauses.title: Use of Content
clauses.text: All content on {{websiteUrl}}, including product images and descriptions, is owned by {{businessName}} and protected by copyright laws.

clauses.title: Privacy & Security
clauses.text: We protect your personal and payment information using encryption and secure transaction methods.

clauses.title: Limitation of Liability
clauses.text: We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of our website or products.

clauses.title: Dispute Resolution
clauses.text: Any disputes will be resolved through binding arbitration, governed by the laws of [US/UK].

clauses.title: Overview
clauses.text: These terms govern your use of {{websiteUrl}}. By accessing this site, you accept these terms in full.

clauses.title: Account Responsibilities
clauses.text: You are responsible for maintaining your account’s confidentiality and security. Notify us if you suspect unauthorized access.

clauses.title: Payment Methods
clauses.text: We accept payments through Visa, Mastercard, PayPal, and other secure payment methods.

clauses.title: Shipping Information
clauses.text: Shipping is available to most locations worldwide. Shipping costs and delivery timeframes will vary based on location.

clauses.title: Returns & Refunds Policy
clauses.text: Returns are accepted within 14 days of purchase for an exchange or refund. Items must be unused and in original condition.

clauses.title: Taxes & Fees
clauses.text: Sales tax or VAT will be added at checkout based on your location. You are responsible for any customs duties or fees.

clauses.title: Privacy & Data Protection
clauses.text: We respect your privacy and take necessary steps to protect your personal information in accordance with our Privacy Policy.

clauses.title: Limitation of Liability
clauses.text: We are not responsible for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from the use of our website.

clauses.title: Intellectual Property Rights
clauses.text: All content on this site, including logos, images, and product descriptions, is owned by {{businessName}} and is protected by copyright laws.

clauses.title: Governing Law & Jurisdiction
clauses.text: These terms are governed by the laws of [US/UK]. Any disputes will be resolved in the courts of [US/UK].

clauses.title: Acceptance of Terms
clauses.text: By using {{websiteUrl}}, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.

clauses.title: Account Registration
clauses.text: You must provide accurate and complete information during registration. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account.

clauses.title: Product Information
clauses.text: We make every effort to accurately display product details. However, we do not guarantee that product descriptions are 100% accurate.

clauses.title: Payment & Billing
clauses.text: All transactions are processed securely. You are responsible for providing accurate billing information and ensuring payment is made in full.

clauses.title: Shipping Policy
clauses.text: We offer a range of shipping options. Delivery time depends on your location and the shipping method chosen at checkout.

clauses.title: Return & Refund Policy
clauses.text: You may return products within 30 days of receiving your order. Refunds will be processed once the return is received and inspected.

clauses.title: Taxes & Duties
clauses.text: Sales tax and other applicable duties will be added to your order at checkout based on your shipping address.

clauses.title: Privacy & Data Protection
clauses.text: Your privacy is important to us. We use your personal information in accordance with our Privacy Policy to process orders and improve your experience.

clauses.title: Limitation of Liability
clauses.text: We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of the site or the products.

clauses.title: Governing Law & Disputes
clauses.text: These terms are governed by the laws of [Jurisdiction]. Any disputes will be handled in the appropriate courts.

clauses.title: Introduction
clauses.text: By using {{websiteUrl}}, you agree to our Terms and Conditions. Please review them carefully before making a purchase.

clauses.title: Account Security
clauses.text: You are responsible for all activities under your account. Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

clauses.title: Pricing & Payments
clauses.text: All prices listed on {{websiteUrl}} are in USD/GBP. Payment must be made at the time of purchase through an approved payment gateway.

clauses.title: Shipping & Delivery
clauses.text: We ship to most countries worldwide. Delivery times and shipping fees are calculated based on your location at checkout.

clauses.title: Returns & Exchanges
clauses.text: You may return items within 14 days of purchase for a full refund. All returned items must be in original condition.

clauses.text: We value your privacy. Personal data collected will be used solely for the purpose of processing your orders and enhancing your experience.

clauses.text: Applicable sales tax/VAT will be calculated and added during checkout based on your location. Any import duties are the responsibility of the buyer.

clauses.title: Prohibited Uses
clauses.text: You agree not to use the website for any illegal activities, including fraud, phishing, or spamming.

clauses.title: Limitation of Liability
clauses.text: We are not liable for any damages or loss caused by using our site or services, whether direct or indirect.

clauses.title: Governing Law
clauses.text: These Terms and Conditions will be governed by the laws of the jurisdiction of [Location], without regard to its conflict of law principles.

clauses.title: Acceptance of Terms
clauses.text: By accessing and using {{websiteUrl}}, you agree to comply with the terms outlined in this agreement.

clauses.title: Account Management
clauses.text: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials and all activities under your account.

clauses.title: Product Information & Availability
clauses.text: We strive to keep product information up to date. However, we cannot guarantee that all information on our website is accurate or complete.

clauses.title: Order Process & Confirmation
clauses.text: Once an order is placed, you will receive a confirmation email. We reserve the right to refuse any order at our discretion.

clauses.title: Shipping Policy
clauses.text: We offer free standard shipping for all orders over a certain amount. Expedited shipping is also available at checkout.

clauses.title: Returns & Refunds
clauses.text: Returns are accepted within 14 days of delivery. To initiate a return, please contact our customer support team for instructions.

clauses.title: Payment Terms
clauses.text: Payments are processed through secure third-party gateways. We accept major credit cards and PayPal.

clauses.title: Intellectual Property
clauses.text: All content on {{websiteUrl}}, including text, images, and logos, is protected by copyright and belongs to {{businessName}}.

clauses.title: Limitation of Liability
clauses.text: We will not be held liable for any damages that arise from the use or inability to use our products, website, or services.

clauses.title: Dispute Resolution
clauses.text: Any disputes will be resolved through binding arbitration in the jurisdiction of [Location].

clauses.title: Introduction
clauses.text: By accessing {{websiteUrl}}, you agree to abide by these Terms and Conditions. These terms govern your use of our site.

clauses.text: You must create an account to make a purchase. You agree to keep your account information confidential and notify us of any suspicious activity.

clauses.text: Prices for products on {{websiteUrl}} are listed in USD/GBP. Payment is due at the time of order and can be made through our approved payment methods.

clauses.text: Shipping charges are calculated at checkout based on your location. We offer several shipping options to meet your needs.

clauses.title: Returns Policy
clauses.text: If you are not satisfied with your purchase, you may return it within 30 days for a refund. Returned items must be in original condition.

clauses.title: Taxes & Duties
clauses.text: All applicable taxes and duties will be added at checkout. You are responsible for any customs fees or import taxes that may be incurred.

clauses.text: We respect your privacy. All personal information provided is handled in accordance with our Privacy Policy.

clauses.title: Prohibited Conduct

clauses.text: All content on {{websiteUrl}} is owned by {{businessName}} and is protected by intellectual property laws.

clauses.title: Governing Law & Jurisdiction
clauses.text: These Terms and Conditions are governed by the laws of [Location]. Disputes will be resolved in the courts of [Location].
